mapper.insert: INSERT INTO emp(TEAMCODE, RANKCODE, POSITIONCODE, EMPLOYMENTCODE, EMPNAME, PASSWORD) VALUES(#{teamCode}, #{rankCode}, #{positionCode}, #{employmentCode}, #{empName}, #{password})
INSERT INTO subemp(empnum, birth, resnum, phonenum, email, hiredate) VALUES(LAST_INSERT_ID(), #{birth}, #{resNum}, #{phoneNum}, #{email}, #{hireDate})
